channel.title: Need auto ban help
channel.description: does some1 have a code that autobans ppl with certain names like syipkpker moderator admin owner plz and how i autoban ppl with nobiwa in their name but onli just nobiwa is okej but not ladnobies sadnobiwa etc.

item.title: Need auto ban help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

When they connect, simply check if the username contains invalid characters, if so… Ban them.

It’s not hard.

Read full topic
